original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1241)@</color>以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(426)@</color> <color=#13ccd7>智力</color>對前方範圍內敵方造成法術傷害，並召喚 <color=#ccffcc>1</color> 座<color=#4cc769>塔樓</color>加入我軍，且這座塔樓每 <color=#ccffcc>10</color> 秒會召喚 <color=#ccffcc>1</color> 隻<color=#4cc769>木鐵人</color>。<color=#4cc769>塔樓</color>和<color=#4cc769>木鐵人</color>屬性<color=#FFE787>體力值：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_HP(1336)@</color>   <color=#FFE787>武力值：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_Str(1336)@</color><color=#FFE787>體力值：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_HP(1241)@</color>   <color=#FFE787>武力值：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_Str(1241)@</color>機率性發動特殊攻擊以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(1351)@</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color> 將範圍內敵方捲起來造成物理傷害
text: <color=#FFE787> Reply time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1241)@</color> to <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(426)@</color><color=#13ccd7>Int</color> inflicts spell damage on the enemy in front of you, and summons <color=#ccffcc>1</color> seat <color=#4cc769>tower</color> to join our army, and this The towers will summon <color=#ccffcc>1</color> every <color=#ccffcc>10</color> seconds only <color=#4cc769>Wooden Iron Man</color>. <color=#4cc769>Tower</color> and <color=#4cc769>Wood Iron Man</color> Attributes <color=#FFE787>Physical Strength: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_HP(1336)@ </color> <color=#FFE787>HP: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_Str(1336)@</color><color=#FFE787>Physical strength value: </color><color=# ccffcc>$Soldier_HP(1241)@</color> <color=#FFE787>HP: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_Str(1241)@</color> Probably launch a special attack to <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(1351)@</color> <color=#80cc00>War</color> Roll up the enemy within the range to cause physical damage
